data.text:
It was the last day of Summer Training Camp. 
Today, once again……I'm being stared at.
data.processed:
󠁿It was the last day of Summer Training Camp. 
󠁿Today, once again……I'm being stared at.

data.text:
I've gotten used to this situation as well. So, whenever I 
felt that gaze on me, I would always respond like this――
data.processed:
󠁿I've gotten used to this situation as well. So, whenever I 
󠁿felt that gaze on me, I would always respond like this――

data.text: ……Not yet.
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed: 󠁿……Not yet.

data.text: Neo Universe responded. She seemed to be having fun.
data.processed: 󠁿Neo Universe responded. She seemed to be having fun.

data.text:
I had also been trying to observe Neo Universe―― 
I tried telling a joke like that.
data.processed:
󠁿I had also been trying to observe Neo Universe―― 
󠁿I tried telling a joke like that.

data.text:
Neo Universe……"Observation" 
……by Trainer……?
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed:
󠁿Neo Universe……"Observation" 
󠁿……by Trainer……?

data.text:
Oops. If someone heard those words, 
they might get the wrong idea.
data.processed:
󠁿Oops. If someone heard those words, 
󠁿they might get the wrong idea.

data.text:
I was just trying to get to know the Uma Musume I was in charge of―― 
I panicked, telling her I didn't mean anything strange by it.
data.processed:
󠁿I was just trying to get to know the Uma Musume I was in charge of―― 
󠁿I panicked, telling her I didn't mean anything strange by it.

data.text: Hmmm……Affirmative.
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed: 󠁿Hmmm……Affirmative.

data.text:
Neo Universe nodded her head. 
It seems like I was able to make her understand……probably.
data.processed:
󠁿Neo Universe nodded her head. 
󠁿It seems like I was able to make her understand……probably.

data.text:
I could hear festival music off in the distance. 
Right about now, the Uma Musume participating in 
the training camp were probably heading to the festival.

choices.text: I'm glad the skies are clear

data.processed:
󠁿I could hear festival music off in the distance. 
󠁿Right about now, the Uma Musume participating in 
󠁿the training camp were probably heading to the festival.

data.text:
Lately, the nights had been cloudy and I haven't been 
able to see the stars. It was the last day, and I could 
see a night sky that couldn't be seen in the city――
data.processed:
󠁿Lately, the nights had been cloudy and I haven't been 
󠁿able to see the stars. It was the last day, and I could 
󠁿see a night sky that couldn't be seen in the city――

data.text:
Suddenly, I remembered the night Neo Universe 
was on the rooftop looking up at the sky.
data.processed:
󠁿Suddenly, I remembered the night Neo Universe 
󠁿was on the rooftop looking up at the sky.

data.text:
Hurry, hurry! It's a festival! A festival~! We worked hard during 
training camp after all, so at the end we've gotta have fun~!
data.name: Energetic Uma Musume
data.processed:
󠁿Hurry, hurry! It's a festival! A festival~! We worked hard during 
󠁿training camp after all, so at the end we've gotta have fun~!

data.text: Yeah, yeah! I want to conquer all the food stalls!
data.name: Excited Uma Musume
data.processed: 󠁿Yeah, yeah! I want to conquer all the food stalls!

data.text:
……"Light Years"……it doesn't reach here, but 
……Today, more so than yesterday……
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed:
󠁿……"Light Years"……it doesn't reach here, but 
󠁿……Today, more so than yesterday……

data.text: Ah……
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed: 󠁿Ah……

data.text:
Neo Universe spotted me and then came running. 
――Good, I thought she might have already headed out.
data.processed:
󠁿Neo Universe spotted me and then came running. 
󠁿――Good, I thought she might have already headed out.

data.text: Neo Universe stood in front of me as I caught my breath.
data.processed: 󠁿Neo Universe stood in front of me as I caught my breath.

data.text: ……Trainer?
data.name: Neo Universe

choices.text: Do you have any plans tonight?

data.processed: 󠁿……Trainer?

data.text:
Plans…… 
……Neo Universe has……for Trainer……
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed:
󠁿Plans…… 
󠁿……Neo Universe has……for Trainer……

data.text:
……has been……"Searching"…… 
That's why, together……with Trainer……
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed:
󠁿……has been……"Searching"…… 
󠁿That's why, together……with Trainer……

data.text: ……Secret place……?
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed: 󠁿……Secret place……?

data.text:
I brought Neo Universe to the seaside, 
far away from the festival music.

choices.text: You can see the stars from here!

data.processed:
󠁿I brought Neo Universe to the seaside, 
󠁿far away from the festival music.

data.text:
The stars sparkled in Neo Universe's eyes. With 
the way the starry sky reflected off of the ocean, 
it almost felt like we were floating in space.
data.processed:
󠁿The stars sparkled in Neo Universe's eyes. With 
󠁿the way the starry sky reflected off of the ocean, 
󠁿it almost felt like we were floating in space.

data.text:
Trainer……have you 
……been observing……Neo Universe?
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed:
󠁿Trainer……have you 
󠁿……been observing……Neo Universe?

data.text: ……I thought there wouldn't be a "Landing".
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed: 󠁿……I thought there wouldn't be a "Landing".

data.text:
……But Trainer did……a "Fly-by"…… 
and the "Trajectory"……wasn't a "Planet"……
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed:
󠁿……But Trainer did……a "Fly-by"…… 
󠁿and the "Trajectory"……wasn't a "Planet"……

data.text:
Neo Universe had wanted to see the stars―― 
I had no doubts that that was what she wanted.
data.processed:
󠁿Neo Universe had wanted to see the stars―― 
󠁿I had no doubts that that was what she wanted.

data.text:
In the end, it seems like I was correct. But there was also 
the possibility that she also wanted to go to the festival.

choices.text: I wanted to see it together……

data.processed:
󠁿In the end, it seems like I was correct. But there was also 
󠁿the possibility that she also wanted to go to the festival.

data.text:
My feelings of wanting to show her this, and my 
feelings of wanting to see this together with her 
aligned. Though I may have been a bit forceful.
data.processed:
󠁿My feelings of wanting to show her this, and my 
󠁿feelings of wanting to see this together with her 
󠁿aligned. Though I may have been a bit forceful.

data.text: ……No. Neo Universe……felt 『Fuzzy』 inside. This is 『Joy』 isn't it?
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed: 󠁿……No. Neo Universe……felt 『Fuzzy』 inside. This is 『Joy』 isn't it?

data.text:
……"Observation" isn't done yet…… 
But……we're "Synchronized" it seems……
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed:
󠁿……"Observation" isn't done yet…… 
󠁿But……we're "Synchronized" it seems……

data.text:
……You'll be 『Elated』. 
Like "Hope" will arrive.
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed:
󠁿……You'll be 『Elated』. 
󠁿Like "Hope" will arrive.

data.text:
……close your eyes. 
Since it will be bright, slowly……
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed:
󠁿……close your eyes. 
󠁿Since it will be bright, slowly……

data.text:
I closed my eyes as she said. 
And when I heard a small voice say 『Open them』――
data.processed:
󠁿I closed my eyes as she said. 
󠁿And when I heard a small voice say 『Open them』――

data.text: It was almost like――
data.processed: 󠁿It was almost like――

data.text:
I could still feel the ground below me……I think. 
I was sure it was just an illusion, being completely 
engulfed by the stars and Neo Universe……
data.processed:
󠁿I could still feel the ground below me……I think. 
󠁿I was sure it was just an illusion, being completely 
󠁿engulfed by the stars and Neo Universe……

data.text:
But, she had just told me that it would be 『Bright』. 
Which meant, this was……an overwhelming scene before 
my eyes, one that would make my feet unsteady.
data.processed:
󠁿But, she had just told me that it would be 『Bright』. 
󠁿Which meant, this was……an overwhelming scene before 
󠁿my eyes, one that would make my feet unsteady.

data.text: I'm right here.
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed: 󠁿I'm right here.

data.text:
Neo Universe stood before me, as if supporting 
me. Her eyes were focused on me, watching my 
reaction, but filled with anxiety and anticipation.
data.processed:
󠁿Neo Universe stood before me, as if supporting 
󠁿me. Her eyes were focused on me, watching my 
󠁿reaction, but filled with anxiety and anticipation.

data.text:
I didn't care if this was real or an illusion. 
Whatever it was, I was feeling 『Elated』.
data.processed:
󠁿I didn't care if this was real or an illusion. 
󠁿Whatever it was, I was feeling 『Elated』.

data.text:
Neo Universe seemed to be fidgety and a little shy. 
Perhaps it was just my imagination.

choices.text: I was able to observe you

data.processed:
󠁿Neo Universe seemed to be fidgety and a little shy. 
󠁿Perhaps it was just my imagination.

data.text: ……Ehehe.
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed: 󠁿……Ehehe.

data.text:
Neo Universe showed me a smile――One filled with 
innocence and felt as if it was just like the stars.
data.processed:
󠁿Neo Universe showed me a smile――One filled with 
󠁿innocence and felt as if it was just like the stars.
